title: Max's Farm
brief_description: Max is a perfectionist. He loves his farm and wants it to be the best. The ‘Farmer’s Weekly’ arrives and his farm rates 27th. That’s a great score, but Max wants it number 1. He tries to improve his farm by eliminating what he thinks are pests, but that just makes his farm worse. He has to find out how to get things work together.
